languages.text: {n}Соломон долго молча сверлит вас взглядом, а затем тихо бормочет:{/n} "Очарователен, значит. Как меня только ни звали, но так — впервые".
{n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон долго молча сверлит вас взглядом, а затем тихо бормочет:{/n} "Очарователен, значит. Как меня только ни звали, но так — впервые".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."
{n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

{n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."
{n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous fixe sans dire mot pendant un long moment, puis marmonne :{/n} « Charmant... On m'a qualifié de beaucoup de choses, mais ça, c'est une première. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous fixe sans dire mot pendant un long moment, puis marmonne :{/n} « Charmant... On m'a qualifié de beaucoup de choses, mais ça, c'est une première. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは長いあいだ黙ってあなたを見つめ、それからぼそりとつぶやいた。{/n}「魅力的、ですか。いろいろと言われてきましたが、そう言われたのは初めてです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは長いあいだ黙ってあなたを見つめ、それからぼそりとつぶやいた。{/n}「魅力的、ですか。いろいろと言われてきましたが、そう言われたのは初めてです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne te mira en silencio y después murmura:{/n} «Encantador. Me han llamado muchas cosas, pero nunca eso».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne te mira en silencio y después murmura:{/n} «Encantador. Me han llamado muchas cosas, pero nunca eso».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙默默地凝视着你，看了很久，之后低声说道。{/n}“太迷人了，是吗？我听过很多人对我的评价，但这还是第一次。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙默默地凝视着你，看了很久，之后低声说道。{/n}“太迷人了，是吗？我听过很多人对我的评价，但这还是第一次。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, bir süre sessizce seni süzdükten sonra mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Çekici demek... Nice laf işittim ama bunu ilk kez duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne bir süre sessizce seni süzdükten sonra mırıldanıyor,{/n} "Çekici, ha... Nice laf işittim ama bunu ilk kez duyuyorum."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne starrt dich lange schweigend an, ehe er murmelt: {/n} "Charmant, in der Tat. Ich habe ja schon viel gehört, aber das ist neu."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at you in silence for a long time, then mutters,{/n} "Charming, indeed. I've been called many things, but that is a first."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne starrt dich lange schweigend an, ehe er murmelt: {/n} "Charmant, in der Tat. Ich habe ja schon viel gehört, aber das ist neu."
